Arima is one of the central locations in Trinidad. it can easily be reached from any major hub via maxi taxis or regular taxis.
Around Christmas time there is an upsurge in "parang" music which is a mixture of French and Spanish folk music.
There are several clubs in the Arima area.

value: For those who like to shoot pool and have a few drinks.
